description:
This course provides students with an opportunity to apply all the knowledge and skills developed across the whole course to a research or real-world problem. Students will undertake a research project or a program of independent enquiry under the direction of an academic or research staff member.

Students commencing a yearlong project in semester 1 enrol in CIVL7511 for semester 1 & semester 2; students commencing a yearlong project in semester 2 enrol in CIVL7512 for semester 2 & the following semester 1
restricted: Enrolment in the Master of Engineering (Civil) or Master Engineering Science (Civil)
